version_description: Minor update to let WeNano users easily scan payment requests generated in WeNano Business. It has never been quicker to pay with Nano!
Fixes cosmetic issue with spotmessages in spotchat. It also reduces time to load spots on the map.
Minor update for fixing rare issues with duplicate messages in spotchat and issue with updating background image in spotchat.
Now every spotchat has the map as the background view as default. And with the unique "pinch to view" gesture, you can decide for yourselves how detailed you want the background to be.
Various fixes and improvements to make the WeNano experience even better
Now works with deep links for businesses
SpotMarket is here! Now spotowners all across the globe can enable SpotMarket in their Spot, letting people close to the Spot list products and service for sale to other WeNano users.

This update integrates ChangeNOW, making it easy to swap between Nano and a large list of popular cryptocurrencies.

Also includes several minor improvements and bug fixes to SpotMarket.
Updates documentation for setting up new Spots

This update includes a slew of improvements making the WeNano experience more fun and engaging

* Visual verification: You can now require visual verification from users when they visit a Spot, and users can easily share their visit to their favorite social media
* Spot sharing: You can now easily create a deep link to share a Spot to the world
* Improved wallet: We have cleaned up the wallet, making it easier and faster to receive Nano
* Contact alert: We will now tell you when someone has added you as a contact
* Spot management: We now allow you to remove empty and inactive Spots
Fix with approving visual payout requests
